sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BASS2630 ( DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , MON_DUTY_YN , TUE_DUTY_YN , WED_DUTY_YN , THUR_DUTY_YN , FRI_DUTY_YN , SAT_DUTY_YN , SUN_DUTY_YN , NOR_PUBC_HODY_CALC_YN , SERVC_DUTY_DOTW_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #dutyDivCd# , #stpInttnSeptVal# , #monDutyYn# , #tueDutyYn# , #wedDutyYn# , #thurDutyYn# , #friDutyYn# , #satDutyYn# , #sunDutyYn# , #norPubcHodyCalcYn# , #servcDutyDotwSeilNum# , #workBusinNum# , #mangeUntBusinNum# , #workUntBusinNum# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE BASS2630 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal# , MON_DUTY_YN=#monDutyYn# , TUE_DUTY_YN=#tueDutyYn# , WED_DUTY_YN=#wedDutyYn# , THUR_DUTY_YN=#thurDutyYn# , FRI_DUTY_YN=#friDutyYn# , SAT_DUTY_YN=#satDutyYn# , SUN_DUTY_YN=#sunDutyYn# , NOR_PUBC_HODY_CALC_YN=#norPubcHodyCalcYn# , SERVC_DUTY_DOTW_SEIL_NUM=#servcDutyDotwSeilNum# , WORK_BUSIN_NUM=#workBusinNum# , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#mangeUntBusinNum# , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM=#workUntBusinNum# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM BASS2630 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , MON_DUTY_YN , TUE_DUTY_YN , WED_DUTY_YN , THUR_DUTY_YN , FRI_DUTY_YN , SAT_DUTY_YN , SUN_DUTY_YN , NOR_PUBC_HODY_CALC_YN , SERVC_DUTY_DOTW_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2630 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND DUTY_DIV_CD=#dutyDivCd# AND STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL=#stpInttnSeptVal#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , DUTY_DIV_CD , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL , MON_DUTY_YN , TUE_DUTY_YN , WED_DUTY_YN , THUR_DUTY_YN , FRI_DUTY_YN , SAT_DUTY_YN , SUN_DUTY_YN , NOR_PUBC_HODY_CALC_YN , SERVC_DUTY_DOTW_SEIL_NUM , WORK_BUSIN_NUM , MANGE_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , WORK_UNT_BUSIN_NUM , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM BASS2630 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , DUTY_DIV_CD DESC , STP_INTTN_SEPT_VAL DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM BASS2630 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
DUTY_DIV_CD LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
